scenario_text.value: Everyone, this way!
Is that really Haru?

Yeah, no doubt about it. That’s the Haru we
know.
Then why’s he running away?

I’m afraid our only option is to inquire this
of the boy himself.
Oh, there he is!
Is... he the real one...?
*sigh*
Yes, I’m me. Not some Kenzoku in disguise.

You expect us to believe that? Then why’d you
run?!

He’s right... We were all so worried about
you.

That day, after we ran from the factory, all
of you guys looked after me...

But I wanted to look for Miyuki, so I went
off on my own. That...made me feel awkward.
Sounds like the real deal, doesn’t he?
Yeah, it all adds up...

So you’re suspicious of me? In that case,
let’s talk about all we’ve done up to now.
Ulp... This has to be the real punk.

Ahaha, definitely! That cocky attitude is
Haru’s trademark for sure!
Hmm... Yes, it would seem so.
Phew, that’s a relief!
Sheesh, so confusing...

Hey, it was just a misunderstanding! That’s
good, right?
(Seriously... I’m relieved to see Haru safe.)

(Seeing how worried we were about him, I’ve
got a thing or two I’d like to say, but...)

(Oh, actually, I wonder if he has any clues
about Miyuki’s whereabouts?)
(What should I say to Haru?)
We were so worried.
I’m glad you’re okay.
Have you seen Miyuki?

Man, do you have any idea how worried we
were? You shouldn’t go off on your own!
Sorry...

Apology accepted. Well, now that we’re all
together, there’s nothing to fear.

Haru, we’re so happy you’re okay. What
a relief...
Takuma... You were that worried?

Of course! You’re one of our friends, after
all.
Friends, you say... Hmph.
So, did you find Miyuki?
...No, not yet.

I see... I’ll tell you the whole story later,
but she’s been taken over by the Master.
It’s dangerous to approach her on your own.
Oh...
At any rate, what were you doing here?

This place means a lot to my sister and me.
I thought I might find her around here.
Means a lot to you?

This is where we lived back in our world.
Even our room is here.

Whoa, for real?! Man, what a dump you lived
in...
Minoru. Rude.
He’s right, just look at it.

It was still pristine when we came here,
though.

Huh? But these apartments were already like
this by the time we got here, right?

Not quite. Miyuki and I came here much
earlier than all of you.

Long enough for this place to fall apart?
Just when did you get here...?

The two of you were alone the whole time...
That must have been tough.
Unbelievable...

Hold up, this ain’t a year or so we’re
talking about... You didn’t grow up?
(Haru’s telling the truth.)

(Miyuki was incredibly confused when we ended
up back in our world...)
What’re you all doing here?
Oh, um... We’re searching for the shrine.
Shrine?
We need it to get everyone back to our world.
I see... Back to your world...
(Hmm? Is Haru glaring at us?)

(No, it must be my imagination. His
expression’s as vacant as ever.)

I remember the waterway back at the park was
suspicious. Is there any way to get inside?
I saw a spot when I walked around here.

Whoa, really?! Would you be willing to show
it to us?
Sure, come with me.
Hmm... Hrrm...

What’s wrong, Professor? Something you wanna
say?

Oh... No, time is of the essence. It’s not
important.
Let us hurry on ahead.
Uh, okay...

(What’s up with the professor? He’s had a
grim look on his face since we found Haru.)
